Position.name: variation
Position.description: Sets the Position to float on top of the containing layout, thus taking no physical space. Or raise it while taking space.

Position.name: placement
Position.description: Sets the placement to top or bottom for variation="floated", and leftorrightforvariation="raised" properties.

Position.name: alignment_x
Position.description: Sets the x-axis alignment of the variation="floated" property.

<script>
    import {
        Badge,
        Button,

    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";

snippets.title: Position Raised

data.render:
Position

Position is a layout primitive that can float itself and child content in specific regions of the containing Components.

Imports

<script>
    import {Position} from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

Floated

You can set the Position to float its self (and its children) into a corner relative to its containing layout via the variation property.

Raised

You can set the Position to raise its self (and its children) in-place via the variation property.
